title.en: Honmono no Kanojo ni Shitakunaru Made, Watashi de Tameshite Ii yo.

altTitles.ja: 本物のカノジョにしたくなるまで、私で試していいよ。

altTitles.ja-ro: Honmono no Kanojo ni Shitaku Naru Made, Watashi de Tameshite Ii yo.

altTitles.en: Try Me Until You Choose Me as Your Real Girlfriend

description.en:
In the reality dating show "Our Season," stunning high school students come together for what seems like the ultimate dream—a perfect youth filled with romance and adventure. But behind the glamorous facade lies a more complicated reality: a false school life where they barter their youth for a chance at stardom in the entertainment world.

Aoishi thought he’d follow the script for a picture-perfect experience. But when he meets Karen, eager to fulfill her first love, and Emma, his scripted girlfriend, everything shifts. Add to that his secret relationship with Asuka, and Aoishi finds himself tangled in a web of desire and deception.

As they go through their lives on camera, the lines between real feelings and fake romances start to blur, pulling them into a storm of complicated relationships and strong emotions. Can Aoishi find a way to untangle the mess before it takes over their lives? The most dangerous part of their youth is just about to begin!

Adapted from a popular light novel, now in manga form!

title.en: Isekai Tensei Slum Machi kara no Nariagari

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Tensei Slum Machi kara no Nariagari

altTitles.ja: 異世界転生スラム街からの成り上がり～採取や猟をしてご飯食べてスローライフするんだ～
異世界転生スラム街からの成り上がり

altTitles.en: Reincarnation in Another World, Rising from the Slums  ~ Gathering and Hunting for Meals to Enjoy a Slow Life~

altTitles.ja: Isekai Tensei Slum Machi kara no Nariagari – Saishuya Ryou wo shite Gohan Tabete Slow Life surun da

altTitles.en: Rising from the Slum City of Reincarnation in Another World ~ Gathering, Hunting, and Living a Slow Life by Eating

description.en: At the age of 6, Ed, a boy suddenly recalls that he is a reincarnated individual from modern Japan. However, his current life unfolds in the slums of another world! Struggling with a poverty-stricken existence in his daily life, he shares his living space with and eats with his childhood friend, a girl named Miinya. Their daily fare consists mainly of 'boiled beans.' Ed, drawing upon his knowledge from modern Japan, discovers edible wild plants and leaves suitable for making tea to improve their dietary situation. In pursuit of a slow life, Ed's life of gathering and hunting begins!
description.ja: 自分が現代日本からの転生者であることを突然思い出した6歳の少年・エド。けれど、彼が現在生活しているのは異世界のスラム街だった!?　日々の暮らしにも困る貧乏生活で、幼馴染で同居している少女・ミーニャと毎日食べているのは「豆の水煮」ばっかり…。エドは現代日本の知識を活かして、食べられる野草やお茶になる葉っぱを見つけ、食生活の改善を図るが!?　スローライフを満喫するため、エドの採取・猟生活が始まる！
description.pt-br: Aos 6 anos de idade, Ed, um menino, de repente se lembra de que é um indivíduo reencarnado do Japão moderno. No entanto, sua vida atual se desenrola nos cortiços de outro mundo! Lutando com uma existência empobrecida em sua vida diária, ele compartilha seu espaço de vida e se alimenta com sua amiga de infância, uma garota chamada Miinya. Sua comida diária consiste principalmente de 'feijões cozidos'. Ed, aproveitando seus conhecimentos do Japão moderno, descobre plantas silvestres comestíveis e folhas adequadas para fazer chá para melhorar sua situação alimentar. Em busca de uma vida tranquila, a vida de Ed de coletar e caçar começa!

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！マスターオブガーデン～七陰列伝～

I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Master Of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~

description.en:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

altTitles.vi: Người đàn ông không thể ly hôn CASE 2

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!
description.es-la: La Segunda Parte de Un Divorcio Imposible, nos cuenta la casi imposible vida de nuestro protagonista "Takeshi Nagase" que tras una noche en la que perdio el conocimiento por culpa de una actriz malvada queda envuelto en un caso de supuesta violación y es alejado de sus hijos. ¡¿Una lucha por demostrar que es inocente?!

description.de:
Eine Legende besagt, dass, wenn du dich zur Geisterstunde mit deiner Gitarre an eine Wegkreuzung stellst, der Teufel erscheint. Er nimmt deine Gitarre, spielt ein Stück und gibt sie dir zurück. Du kehrst als erfahrener Bluesman zurück, doch der Preis dafür ist deine Seele.

Wir schreiben das Jahr 1929. Tief im Mississippi-Delta träumt ein junger Mann namens RJ davon, eines Tages ein Bluesman zu werden. RJ ist ein einfacher Bauer, der kaum Gitarre spielen kann, doch als er eines Nachts einen Spaziergang macht, ändert sich sein Leben für immer.
description.en:
Legend has it that if you take your guitar and stand at a crossroads at the witching hour, the devil will appear. 
He'll grab your instrument, play a song, and hand it back to you. 
You'll walk away an expert bluesman, but you'll have to pay the price: your immortal soul.
description.es:
La leyenda dice que si tomas tu guitarra y te paras en una encrucijada a la mitad de la noche, el diablo se te aparecerá, afinara tu guitarra, tocará una canción y te la devolverá. Te alejarás siendo un experto en blues, pero tendrás que pagar el precio: tu alma inmortal.

Robert Johnson no inventó el Blues, pero si lo redefinió con tal habilidad que se convirtió en el más famoso e influyente músico de blues y rock and roll en la historia. Hay una leyenda bastante conocida que cuenta cómo obtuvo su habilidad con la guitarra al venderle su alma al diablo en un cruce de caminos a media noche, este manga es en honor a su vida, aunque no necesariamente sea históricamente precisa.

description.en:
Shoto Kazama, a boy who has never been able to win at card games because of his habit of giving up on things easily, enters the immersive world of Digimon Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend, Arisa Kinosaki.

The game allows players to engage in highly realistic card battles. At first, Shoto is hesitant towards it, but through his engrossing encounters with the Digimon there, he becomes a fan of the game.

Encounters with wild Digimon such as Pteromon and battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion for Shoto and his companions.

This is a story about Digimon, and the world.
description.ja:
諦め癖がついて中々カードバトルに勝てない少年・風真照人は、幼馴染みの城之崎有紗の誘いでフルダイブゲーム〝デジモンリベレイター〟の世界へと足を踏み入れた。

メタバース空間・ラクーナで臨場感溢れるカードバトルを楽しむことが出来るリベレイター。このゲームに最初は抵抗があった照人だったが、リアルなデジモンとの触れ合いを通じて次第に夢中になっていく。

そして、野生のデジモン・プテロモン達との出会い。暴走するNPCとのバトル。様々な出会いが、照人達の運命の歯車を大きく動かしていく。

これは〝デジモン〟と〝世界〟を巡る物語だ。

description.ar:
عرضت أريا عقد زواج. إلى الدوق الاكبر فالنتين الذي قيل أنه باع روحه للشيطان. حتى تتمكن من حماية نفسها ولويد [تزوجني] أعطته أريا مذكرة تطلب يده للزواج بورقة القيقب الصغيرة مثل يديها. [إنه عقد زواج ، لذا سنتطلق بعد 10 سنوات ...] أمسك السيد الشاب بالملاحظة التي كانت آريا تكتبها ومزقها إلى أشلاء. "إذن أين يمكنني ختمها؟" "أخبرتني أنك ستطلقني بمجرد أن نتقدم في السن." كبر الشيطان الصغير وقبل جبهتها. "منذ أن أصبحنا بالغين ، علينا بدلاً من ذلك إبرام عقد للبالغين".

description.cs:
"Ak existuje ďalší život, zachránim ťa." Aria je posledná siréna, netvor, ktorý očaruje ľudí piesňou. Spútaná je nútená spievať šľachticom, až kým nezomrie. Kým ju démonizovaný veľkovojvoda Lloyd Valentine oslobodí, je už neskoro. Už vydýchla naposledy... alebo si to aspoň myslí. Keď sa Aria prebudí v minulosti, zasvätí svoj život ochrane vojvodu, ale rozmýšľa, či je to naozaj všetko, za čo jej krátky život stojí. Bude niekedy slobodná? Alebo je táto siréna predurčená spievať navždy tú istú pieseň?

---

description.en:
Aria offered a contract marriage. To Grand Duke Valentine who was said to have sold his soul to the devil. So she could protect herself and him.

"Marry me."

Aria passed him a note which asked for his hand in marriage with her little maple leaf like hands.

"It's a contract marriage so we'll divorce 10 years later..."

The young master grabbed the note Aria was writing and ripped it to shreds.

"So where do I stamp it?"

"You told me you'll divorce me once we're older."

The young devil grew up and kissed her forehead.

"Since we have become adults, we have to instead make a contract for adults."

---
“If there is a next life, I will save you.”

Aria is the last remaining siren, a monster who bewitches humans with song. Shackled, she is forced to sing to nobles until she coughs blood. By the time the demonized Grand Duke Lloyd Valentine frees her, it’s too late. She has already breathed her last… or so she thinks. When she awakens in the past, Aria dedicates her life to protecting the duke, but she wonders if that’s really all her life is worth. Will she ever be free? Or is this siren destined to sing the same song forever?

---

description.fr:
Aria est la dernière des Sirènes, dont le chant ensorcelle les humains. Enfermée dans la cage de l'Empereur, elle doit chanter jusqu'à la mort. Lorsque le duc de Valentine, noble maudit et habité par un démon, lui propose de tuer toute la cour pour la libérer, Aria, déjà condamnée, accepte. Mais avant de rendre son dernier souffle, elle revient dans le passé, à l'année de ses dix ans. Saisissant cette nouvelle chance, elle va tout faire pour sauver le duc de la malédiction qui pèse sur lui...

---

description.id:
Setelah ibunya yang seorang siren meninggal, Aria menjadi burung yang terkurung dan harus bernyanyi untuk kaisar sampai mati. Di saat dia hampir mati, Lloyd, grand duke iblis datang dan membawa Aria keluar dari kandang burung. Saat itu Aria berpikir... "Kalau ada kehidupan selanjutnya, aku akan menolongmu." Ketika ia membuka mata, Aria kembali pada waktu di mana dia berusia 10 tahun. Saat itu dia berencana untuk melakukan pernikahan kontrak dengan Lloyd demi melindungi dirinya dan Lloyd.

description.it:
"Nella prossima vita, ti salverò". Aria è l'ultima sirena rimasta e, con il suo canto, incanta gli esseri umani. Rinchiusa ed incatenata, è costretta a cantare per i nobili fino al punto di tossire sangue. Quando il "demone" Granduca Lloyd la salva è ormai troppo tardi ed Aria esala l'ultimo respiro tra le sue braccia. Quando si risveglia, Aria si ritrova nel suo corpo di bambina di 10 anni. Decide così di prendere in mano la sua vita e di dedicarla alla protezione del Granduca, in segno di gratitudine per averla salvata. Ma Aria sarà mai davvero libera?

---

description.ko:
아리아는 계약 결혼을 제안했다.
그것도, 악마에게 영혼을 팔았다는 발렌타인의 대공자에게.
자신을 지키고, 그를 지키기 위해서.

[나와 결혼해.]

아리아는 단풍잎 같은 손으로, 쪽지와 함께 혼인 서약서를 내밀었다.

[계약 결혼이니까 10년 뒤에 이혼…….]

그러자 어린 대공자는 쓰고 있던 쪽지를 빼앗아 쫙쫙 찢으며 말했다.

“그래서, 도장은 어디에 찍으면 되지?”

“크면 이혼해주겠다고 했잖아.”

어느새 훌쩍 자란 악마 대공이, 그녀의 머리카락 위에 경건하게 입을 맞추며 말했다.

“어른이 되었으니 어른의 계약을 해야지.”

description.pt-br:
Sereias... um nome derivado de uma criatura antiga, usado para descrever aqueles que podem encantar, atrair, controlar e curar os outros cantando. Anos atrás, uma sereia chamada Sophia foi sequestrada pelo conde Cortez como sua preciosa sereia, e uma garota chamada Aria nasceu logo depois como sua filha. Sujeita a viver a vida de uma sereia, Aria experimentou, viu e ouviu muitas coisas horríveis. Outros fariam qualquer coisa para ouvi-la cantar, ao ponto da insanidade. O imperador, que ficou obcecado por ela, quebrou suas pernas e a trancou em uma gaiola dentro do palácio imperial para escondê-la e mantê-la para si mesmo. Despedaçada terrivelmente, Aria se resignou à morte, quando de repente - O Arquiduque Diabólico, Lloyd Cardenis Valentine, chegou e sussurrou: "Devo matar todos aqui? Se precisar de mim, é só me chamar. Sua música sempre me alcançará, onde quer que você esteja." No final, Aria chamou o diabo, levando a morte a todos os presentes, exceto ela mesma. "Vamos cair no inferno juntos." E com isso, Aria deu seu último suspiro e morreu... apenas para voltar a ser como era há 10 anos. Agora que ela tem uma segunda chance em sua vida, Aria está determinada a mudar seu destino, assim como o futuro cruel de seu salvador, o arquiduque Valentine. Ela lhe propõe um contrato de casamento, com o divórcio planejado 10 anos depois, mas ele tem outros planos...

---

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukaima wa Osananajimi

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの最強テイマー、使い魔は幼馴染

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukai ma wa Osananajimi

altTitles.en: The Strongest Tamer Returned From Another World With His Childhood Friend as His Familiar

altTitles.id: Penjinak Terkuat Kembali Dari Dunia Lain Dengan Teman Masa Kecilnya sebagai Familiarnya

description.en:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!
description.ja: 「でも私、ご主人様の渉（わたる）がいないと何もできないよ？」　異世界に突然召喚され、危機を救った高校生の渉と瑠美は、無事に現実世界へと帰還した。しかし、戻ってきたはずの現実世界は様変わりしていて、ダンジョンが発生し、人類はスキルに目覚め、まるで異世界と同じような世界になっていて…　異世界帰りのテイマー・渉と、その使い魔・瑠美。幼馴染以上恋人未満の最強コンビが無双するダンジョンファンタジー

description.en: The manga's story begins when a peasant named Hanbē asks a girl named O-haru for her hand in marriage, but O-haru confesses that she is already thinking of another man named Masakichi from a neighboring village. When Hanbē seeks out Masakichi, he finds that Masakichi possesses a sword and the skills to use it, despite being a peasant.
description.ru: Крестьянин по имени Ханбэй делает предложение руки и сердца девушке по имени Охару, однако она признаётся, что влюблена в другого парня, Масакити, живущего в соседней деревне. Когда Ханбэй отправляется на поиски Масакити, чтобы сразиться с ним, он обнаруживает, что тот умело обращается с мечом, несмотря на то, что он тоже крестьянин. Во время их схватки они слышат крик тонущей девочки, которая просит о помощи, после чего вдвоём бросаются на помощь, в процессе чего погибают в бурном потоке реки. После смерти оба парня оказываются в той самой, всем хорошо знакомой комнате.

title.en: Bishuu Gyakuten Sekai de Chiryoushi Yattemasu

altTitles.ja: 美醜逆転世界で治療師やってます

altTitles.en: I'm a Healer in the Reversed World of Beauty and Ugliness

description.en:
One day, Towa was suddenly transferred to a new world. This world resembles a world from a novel that Towa recently read. 

It's been half a year since he came to this world. Towa opened a clinic as a Healer using the ability he received from the Goddess. However, the only ones who come are well-groomed, servile beauties. This is because this was a world where the value of beauty and ugliness were reversed. 

He is kind to everyone, no matter how ugly (beautiful in Towa's eyes), and wins the hearts of the ugly beauties in the world.
description.id:
Suatu hari, Towa tiba-tiba dipindahkan ke dunia baru. Dunia ini menyerupai dunia dari novel yang baru saja dibaca Towa.

Sudah setengah tahun sejak dia datang ke dunia ini. Towa membuka klinik sebagai Penyembuh menggunakan kemampuan yang diterimanya dari Dewi.

Namun, satu-satunya yang datang adalah wanita cantik yang terawat dan seperti budak. DIkarenakan ini adalah dunia dimana nilai keindahan dan keburukan dibalik.
description.ja:
不遇な美女冒険者たちの寄る辺ないココロとカラダを癒やします♪

美醜の価値観が逆転した世界に転生した主人公・トーワ。女神様から受けた転生特典“治癒能力”を活かし治療院を営んでいたある日、見るからに美しいエルフ少女が治療を受けにやって来る。しかし、なぜか腰をガクガクしていて様子がおかしい……と思ったら、トーワを押し倒していきなり襲いかかってきて――！？

title.en: 1-Nen Inai ni Ojousama o Kouryaku Suru Maid no Ohanashi

altTitles.ja: 1年以内にお嬢様を攻略するメイドのお話

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichinen Inai ni Ojou-sama o Kouryaku Suru Maid no Ohanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About A Maid Conquering A Young Lady Within A Year

description.en: I'm a sorcerer's apprentice. Izumi Taro, a witch, kidnapped me from Hitogoroshi and asked me to live with him. But Taro Izumi has probably killed someone before... Sakae Kusama's first full-length series, depicting the cool and gentle days of a useless adult and a lonely child, opens!

altTitles.ja: ガールズ＆パンツァー リトルアーミー

description.en:
In the world, the manipulation of tanks (Sensha-do) is one of the traditional martial arts especially for girls. Miho doesn't like Sensha-do and moves to Oarai Girl's High School. But the chairperson of the student council orders Miho to participate in the national Sensha-do championship.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2015)
description.pl: Na świecie operacja czołgami (Sensha-do) jest jedną z tradycyjnych sztuk walki, szczególnie dla dziewcząt. Miho nie lubi Sensha-do i przenosi się do liceum Oarai Girl's High School. Jednak Przewodnicząca Samorządu Uczniowskiego nakazuje Miho wziąć udział w krajowych mistrzostwach Sensha-do.---Oficjalne wydanie:- Wydanie indonezyjskie przez Elex Media (2015)

description.en: "Botsu" as in "rejected/unused concept"

altTitles.ja: いちごの入ったソーダ水

description.en: Mannenrou Ladies' Academy is famous for its upper class and posh students. Despite knowing how out-of-place she'd be, the former yankee, Hanaizumi Luna, decides to enroll there. Moreover, according to her underling: "Girls' schools means yuri!! Add in school dormitories? Now that's a world of girl on girl action!!"

Rosenne Walker was imprisoned for killing her husband at the age of seventeen.  
Although she attempted to escape several times, she was eventually caught and arrested in Monte Island, the worst prison on earth.

And Ian Connor was responsible for transporting her. He never blinked an eye at Rosenne's shameless lies. 

However, Ian suddenly came into realisation that her lies might be the truth.

"Will you believe me no matter what I say?"

"It doesn't matter, so tell me anything, Rosenne."

Will her lies turn out to be the truth in a time that is unstoppable?

---
Infamous jailbreaker Rosen Walker is finally being transferred to the Isle of Monte, the most notorious maximum security prison in the world. Her guard? It’s none other than the beloved war hero of the empire himself — Ian Connor. Now Ian must unravel the truth. Did Rosen really commit the murder? Or is there more to the story?

description.ja:
16歳の時、夫を殺した罪で収監されたローゼン·ウォーカー。「アルカペズの魔女」と呼ばれる彼女は数回の脱獄の末に逮捕され、地上最悪の刑務所・モンテ島に移送されることになる。 そして彼女の移送責任を引き受けた司令官、イアン·カーナー。彼はローゼンの図々しい嘘にも決して動じない。しかし、彼女の話を聞くうちにいつの間にか彼女の嘘が本当だと考えるようになるイアン。 止まらない時間の中で、彼女の嘘は真実になれるだろうか。

description.ko:
열일곱 나이에 남편을 죽인 죄목으로 수감된 로젠 워커.
여러 차례의 탈옥을 시도했지만 결국 체포되어 지상 최악의 교도소, 몬테섬으로 가게 된다.

그리고 그런 그녀의 수송책임을 맡은 이안 커너.
그는 로젠의 뻔뻔한 거짓말에 눈도 깜짝하지 않는다.

하지만 어느샌가 그녀의 거짓말이 진짜일 것이라는 생각을 하게 되는 이안.

"내가 무슨 말을 하든 믿을 수 있어?"

"상관없다. 그러니 뭐든 말해 줘, 로젠."

멈추지 않는 시간 속에서, 그녀의 거짓말은 진짜가 될 수 있을까?

description.ru:
Розен Уокер была арестована по обвинению в убийстве мужа в семнадцатилетнем возрасте.
Своими двумя побегами она растоптала гордость имперской армии, но была вновь схвачена в течение года и приговорена к пожизненному лишению свободы.

Плывя на корабле к острову Монте, где отбывают свой срок худшие из худших, Розен строила еще один план побега, но...
-- Обвинение?
-- Я невиновна.
-- Редко какой заключенный честно признается в своем преступлении.

Сухой, прямолинейный, принципиальный Иан Конор, ответственный за доставку девушки, не оставляет ни единой лазейки для побега.
-- Довольно сотрясать воздух, отвечай на заданный вопрос".

Розен Уокер - лучшая беглянка империи и Иан Конор - молодой герой войны и любимец всей страны. Их история начинается на корабле, направляющемся в самую страшную тюрьму на всех континентах!  Итак, Розен Уокер лгунья или нет? Решать вам!

以弑夫之名入狱的囚犯罗蒂·夏沃斯，关押期间两次越狱成功。传闻她危险狡诈却又蛊人，这次她将被送往最可怕的监狱—蒙泰岛。而押送她的是闻名全国的-帝国英雄伊恩·康纳。冷酷而坚毅的康纳对罗蒂随口而出的各种谎言置若罔闻。冷酷与狡诈的交锋，随着时间的流逝，她的谎言是否能成功？

description.zh:
纯情小白恋上高冷万人迷，
青涩的他能否勇敢追爱？
长相秀气，以至于经常被误认为是女孩子的延禹，正在暗恋同校的万人迷蒋晗抒。然而极其认生，性格怯懦的延禹还从未跟同班的晗抒说过话…在各种同学的助攻下，延禹能否鼓起勇气，勇敢追爱呢？

altTitles.en: I Accidentally Seduced the Male Lead's Younger Brother

description.en:
She possessed the mistress of the male lead in an R19 novel. In the original novel, the male lead was trash who abandoned her after getting her pregnant, saying that he belatedly realized that he loved the heroine. Fortunately, it was still before the original work started. She decided to scrap that shit herself.

"No, I don't want to," she flatly rejected Killian's offer to have an affair with him.

When he asked her why, she smiled brightly and answered, "Young Master is not my taste. If I must say, your younger brother is much preferable.”

"What? You prefer my younger brother?"

*Yeah. Not you, but your brother.*

Unlike the original, she firmly set up an iron wall, took care of Lexion, the younger brother who was abused by his elder brother, and protected the original female lead who had low-esteem from that shitty male lead.

And now that she'd already done what she had to do, she's off to go.

But a few years later–

Lexion, who had pushed out his older brother and taken the ducal title, came back to her as a beast with a decadent beauty. On top of that, he was even holding the engagement document that she had signed as a joke during their childhood.

"I've never forgotten you for a moment. Please marry me, Noona."

*No, wasn't that just for playing house?*

Every time she refuses his marriage proposal, he gently hugs her around the waist, and asks in a cold voice, "Did your taste change while I was away?"

Lexion's eyes were full of life as he asked.

It was as if when he found out who her type was, he'd kill them right away.

---

description.es:
“No, no quiero.”

La propuesta fue rechazada como un golpe en seco.

“Confucio no es de mi agrado. Mi preferencia es el hermano menor de Confucio”.

“¿Qué? ¿A mi hermana le gusta?”

“Así es. No tú, sino tu hermano.”

===

Ese ‘hermano menor’ vino a nosotros como una bestia con una belleza trascendental. 

“Nunca te he olvidado ni por un solo momento. Por favor, cásate conmigo, hermana.”

---

description.id:
Dia memiliki kekasih dari pemeran utama pria dalam novel R19. Dalam novel aslinya, pemeran utama pria adalah sampah yang mencampakkannya setelah membuatnya hamil, mengatakan bahwa dia terlambat menyadari bahwa dia mencintai pahlawan wanita tersebut. Untungnya, itu masih sebelum pekerjaan aslinya dimulai. Saya memutuskan untuk menghapus omong kosong ini sendiri. *** "Tidak, aku tidak mau". Aku dengan tegas menolak tawaran Killian untuk berselingkuh dengannya. Ketika dia bertanya mengapa, saya tersenyum cerah dan menjawab. “Tuan Muda tidak sesuai dengan seleraku. Jika saya harus mengatakan, adik laki-laki Anda jauh lebih disukai. ” "Itu? Apakah kamu lebih suka adik laki-lakiku?" "Ya. Bukan kamu, tapi kakakmu." *** Berbeda dengan aslinya, saya dengan kuat membangun tembok besi, merawat Lexion, adik laki-laki yang dilecehkan oleh kakak laki-lakinya, dan melindungi pemeran utama wanita asli yang memiliki harga rendah terhadap pemeran utama pria yang tidak bermutu itu. Dan sekarang setelah saya melakukan apa yang harus saya lakukan, saya akan pergi. Namun beberapa tahun kemudian, Lexion, yang melewati kakak laki-lakinya dan duduk di kursi sang duke, kembali kepadaku seperti binatang buas dengan kecantikan dekaden. Selain itu, dia bahkan memegang dokumen jaminan yang saya tandatangani sebagai lelucon saat masih kecil. “Aku tidak pernah melupakanmu sedetik pun. Tolong menikahlah denganku, noona.” Tidak, bukankah itu hanya untuk bermain rumah? Setiap kali saya menolak lamaran pernikahannya, dia dengan lembut memeluk pinggang saya dan bertanya kepada saya dengan suara yang begitu dingin. "Apakah seleramu berubah saat aku pergi?" Mata Lexion penuh dengan kehidupan saat dia bertanya. Ini seperti ketika dia mengetahui siapa tipeku, dia akan langsung membunuhnya.

---

Обычный офисный работник перевоплотился в романе 18+ в второстепенного персонажа, который изначально был любовницей главного героя. В оригинальном романе главный герой бросил ее после того, как она забеременела, сказав, что запоздало понял, что любит главную героиню. Теперь у нее есть шанс изменить судьбу этого персонажа и отказать главному герою: «Я на это не соглашусь!»

description.vi:
Tôi đã sở hữu cơ thể người yêu của nam chính trong một cuốn tiểu thuyết 19+. Trong nguyên tác, nam chính đích thị là một tên rác rưởi. Anh ta đã vứt bỏ cô sau khi làm cô có thai, còn bonus thêm câu anh ta đã vô tình rơi vào lưới tình của nữ chính. May thay, hiện giờ nguyên tác chưa bắt đầu. Vậy nên, tôi đã quyết định tự mình loại bỏ tên rác rưởi đó. *** “Không thích” Tôi đã nhanh chóng từ chối lời đề nghị làm người yêu từ Killian. Anh ta muốn hỏi tôi lý do với khuôn mặt đầy dấu chấm hỏi, tôi chỉ nhẹ nhàng nở nụ cười rạng rở và trả lời. “Thiếu gia đây không phải gu tôi. Gu tôi chính là em trai của thiếu gia cơ” “Gì? Em thích em trai của ta?” Chính xác rồi đó anh trai. Không phải anh, mà là em trai của anh cơ. *** Không như nguyên tác, tôi đã xây dựng một bức tường thành chắc chắn nhằm ngăn chặn tên thiếu gia kia. Bắt đầu chăm sóc cho Lexion, người bị anh trai của mình ngược đãi và cũng chính là người đã bảo vệ nữ chính. Và khi đã hoàn thành công việc, tôi đã nhanh chóng tẩu thoát khỏi dinh thự công tước. Nhưng trôi qua mấy năm. Lexion, người đã đẩy cái tên khốn kia ra khỏi vị trí công tước và tự mình ngồi chễm chệ trên vị trí đó đã trở thành một con thú và đến tìm tôi. Đồng thời còn mang theo một tờ giấy đính hôn có sẵn chữ ký như trò đùa khi nhỏ. “Em chưa hề quên chị dù chỉ một phút. Chị kết hôn với em nhé” Điều đó chẳng phải chỉ để con nít chơi với nhau à? Mỗi lần từ chối, anh ta lại bắt đầu quấn lấy eo của tôi mà ôm. Quá mệt mỏi, tôi đã hỏi anh ta với vẻ mặt nghiêm túc. “Chẳng lẽ em đã thay đổi gu trong thời gian chị vắng mặt?” Đôi mắt của Lexion chứa đầy sát khí khi tôi cất lời. Cứ như thể khi anh ta phát hiện ra gu của tôi là ai, anh ta sẽ giết người đó ngay lập tức.

---

description.zh:
“公爵不是我喜欢的类型，我喜欢的是公爵您的弟弟。” 果断拒绝油腻海王公爵的的提议，这一世我不会做你的情人，没想到随便使用的借口，却让对方上了心。那个小软萌弟弟长大后居然变成了一个病娇美男？“姐姐不是说喜欢我吗？”这个婚约该怎么拒绝呀！

description.pt-br:
**“Jovem mestre, você não faz o meu tipo… Eu quero o seu irmão!”**

“Você não faz o meu tipo, jovem mestre. Prefiro muito mais o seu irmão mais novo.”
“O quê? O meu irmão?”
“Isso mesmo, o seu irmão, não você.”

===
 Quando criança, eu assinei um contrato de casamento com este “irmão mais novo”, eu só não contava que…
“Eu nunca me esqueci de você, por favor, case-se comigo!”
Ele disse isso enquanto segurava o contrato que foi assinado quando éramos crianças, mas espera… não era tudo apenas uma brincadeira??!

---
"Não." Rejeitei categoricamente a oferta do canalha de ter um caso comigo. “O jovem mestre não é meu tipo. Meu tipo é seu irmão.” "O quê? Meu irmão é o seu tipo?" Garfos. Não você, mas seu irmão. * * * O 'irmão' veio até mim, uma fera da decadência. “Nunca me esqueci de você nem por um momento, quero que se case comigo, irmã.” Segurando os papéis de noivado que assinei de brincadeira na minha infância. Não, isso não era para uma brincadeira de criança? "Você mudou seus gostos enquanto eu estava fora?" Os olhos de Lexion estavam cheios de emoção quando ele perguntou. É como se ele soubesse do meu novo gosto, ele me mataria imediatamente.

---

altTitles.ja: 魔力絶無の竜拳使い～魔力ゼロの竜王の息子、ぼっち故に、友達を作るために魔導学園で無双する～

description.en: Sharks don't have lungs, but they do have to breathe oxygen to survive. Instead of breathing air, though, sharks get oxygen from the water that surrounds them. So they have to move around, if they stop moving for a while, they sink into the water and die, So Sharks have to move and move constantly from birth to death. The same goes for you. If you want to survive, keep moving, then you will be the best hunter… like a shark.

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ愛が重いダークエルフが異世界から追いかけてきた

A Dark Elf with a Slightly Overwhelming Love Chased Me All the Way from Another World
A Slightly Pushy Dark Elf Chased Me from Another World
A Slightly Clingy Dark Elf Chased Me from Another World
A Dark Elf With Love That's Only A Little Heavy Chased Me From Another World

description.en:
Hinata is a high school student who reincarnated into a different world and became a hero by the power of God. He defeated the Demon King with the help of the dark elf Mariabelle and other friends. Thus he safely fulfilled the wishes of God and returned to this world.

One month after Hinata returned to this world, for some reason Mariabelle also came here from the other world !! The reason she came here is to be with her beloved Hinata !! ~~~ With heavy love and a teaspoon of jealousy, she attacked Hinata every time he refused !! (in many ways).

Will Hinata, who has decided to live with the Yandere Mariabelle, be able to live safely (?) !! A sweet and thick romantic comedy woven around the dark elf beauty's slightly heavy schizophrenic love !!!

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.
description.id: Hinata, seorang siswa SMA yang bereinkarnasi di dunia lain dan menjadi pahlawan dengan kekuatan Dewa. Mengalahkan Raja Iblis bersama Mariabel "Dark Elf", dan bersama teman-temannya. Penuhi keinginan Dewa dengan aman dan kembali ke dunia ini lagi. Satu bulan setelah itu, Hinata kembali ke dunianya, tetapi Mariabel juga datang ke sini dari dunia lain!! Alasan dia datang ke sini adalah untuk mengikuti Hinata yang dicintainya!! Dan hanya untuknya, Dia menyerang Hinata setiap kali dia menolaknya. cinta yang berat dan satu sendok teh kecemburuan!! (dalam banyak hal). Bisakah Hinata, yang telah memutuskan untuk hidup dengan Dark Elf, hidup dengan aman (?)!! Sebuah komedi romantis manis dan gravitasi yang menjalin dengan kecantikan Echizosic Dark Elf yang agak berat!!! (Manga ini terinpirasi dari manga H)
description.ja:
異世界に転生し、神の力で勇者になった高校生のヒナタ。ダークエルフのマリアベル、その仲間たちと共に魔王を討伐。無事、神の願いを叶えて現世へと帰還を果たす。
それから一カ月、現世に帰ったヒナタだったが、なぜかマリアベルが異世界からこちらに来てしまう!! こちらへ来た理由、それは愛しのヒナタと添い遂げるため!! しかも彼女、ヒナタにたいして少～～～～～しだけ重い愛と小さじ一杯分ぐらいの嫉妬心で事あるごとにヒナタを襲うのだった!!（色んな意味で）。
なし崩しでダークエルフと同棲することになったヒナタは無事（？）に暮らすことができるのか!!

ちょい重いダークエルフのエキゾチック美女と織りなす、甘くてグラビティな逆異世界同棲ラブコメ!!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Sasayaku you ni Koi o Utau

altTitles.ja: ささやくように恋を唄う

altTitles.pt-br: Sussurrando Uma Canção De Amor Para Você

description.en: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…
description.es: Himari comienza la escuela secundaria y en su primer día atiende el concierto del club de música ligera en el gimnasio de la escuela, enamorándose a primera vista con la cantante Yori y confesándole su amor en los casilleros de zapatos. Buscándo a dicha cantante, Himari se entera de que Yori no es parte del mencionado club y que a ella le gusta tocar música sola en la terraza de la escuela. Allí, se entera de que Yori también se enamoró de ella.
description.fr: Himari est une lycéenne de première année qui, dès le premier jour, assiste à la représentation du club de musique au gymnase de l'école. Elle a eu le coup de foudre pour la chanteuse Yori, à qui elle s'est déclarée devant les casiers du lycée. En cherchant ledit élève plus tard, elle découvre qu'elle ne fait pas vraiment partie du club et qu'elle aime jouer de la musique seule sur le toit. Là, elle découvre que Yori aussi est tombée amoureuse d'elle.
description.ru:
Химари влюбилась в солистку группы, которая выступала на приветственной вечеринке новых студентов. После разговора с Химари Ёри — солистка группы — поняла, что влюбилась в неё с первого взгляда...

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://readmanga.io/proshepchu_tebe_pesniu_o_liubvi__A5238))
description.uk: Життєрадісна, енергійна старшокласниця Хімарі по вуха закохалася у свого семпая, на ім'я Йорі після того, як почула виступ її групи першого дня навчання. Хімарі відразу зізнається Йорі у своїх почуттях і на подив Хімарі, Йорі каже, що вона теж закохана в неї! Але коли Хімарі розуміє, що вони відчувають два різні види кохання, вона починає ставити собі питання, що ж насправді означає "любов".
description.es-la: "Whispering you a love song" es la historia de un amor a primera vista que inicia en la temporada de los cerezos en flor. Himari, una nueva estudiante de la preparatoria, queda fascinada por Yori-senpai, la vocalista de la banda de chicas que se presenta en la ceremonia de inauguración del año escolar.
description.pt-br: Himari é uma caloura do ensino médio que no primeiro dia assiste a apresentação do clube de música light na academia da escola, apaixonando-se pelo veterano e cantor Yori à primeira vista, confessando-se a ela nos armários dos sapatos. Mais tarde, procurando pelo dito veterano, Himari descobre que Yori não faz parte do clube e que, em vez disso, gosta de tocar música sozinha no telhado. Lá, ela descobre que Yori também se apaixonou por ela.

altTitles.id: Aku Ingin Menggunakan Keterampilan Yang Diberikan Untuk Mendapatkan Uang Dan Menggoda Wanita Cantik Dari Dunia Lain

altTitles.ja-ro: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.en: I Want to Use the Skills Given to Earn Money and Flirt With Beauties From Other World

altTitles.pt-br: Quero usar as habilidade que me foi dado para ganhar dinheiro e flertar com lindas mulheres de outro mundo.

description.en: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.
description.pt-br: Naquele dia, Ishida Yamada estava trabalhando meio período, como sempre. Ao abrir a porta dos fundos após terminar seu trabalho de meio período, ele encontrou um espaço em branco e uma pessoa que se autodenominava Deus. Foi por acaso que ele foi escolhido por Deus para ir para outro mundo. Ele ficou perplexo, mas decidiu viver mesmo assim. Pensando em como sobreviver neste outro mundo usando as habilidades que recebeu de Deus, ele tenta ao máximo ter um relacionamento físico com uma linda mulher neste outro mundo.

description.en:
Ji-woo transfers to a rural school with his parents who have returned to farming. The fresh air, the relaxed atmosphere... he liked them all. However, for a moment that seemed like a pleasant start,

Ji-woo discovers that the flower garden that he has carefully cared for has been messed up.. Ji-woo, who thought it was someone's territoriality, suspects Dongchan, who was particularly harsh to him at school.
First off, that bangs! I'll start with those bangs that make it impossible to know what you're thinking!!
description.fr: La vie à la campagne est censée être idyllique, non ? Un endroit paisible rempli d'aimables voisins au grand cœur, pas vrai ? C'est ce que Jiwoo attend avec impatience... Mais de tous les voisins qu'il aurait pu avoir, c'est Dongchan qu'il est le sien. Froid, distant et insondable, Dongchan n'est pas le plus accueillant du voisinage. En fait, on dirait qu'il n’a pas du tout envie que Jiwoo et sa famille s’installent ici. Déconcerté mais pas découragé, Jiwoo fait de son mieux pour s'adapter à la vie à la campagne... jusqu'à ce qu'il s'avère que quelqu'un essaie de chasser sa famille d'ici. Jiwoo a des soupçons, mais sera-t-il capable de trouver le vrai coupable ?
description.ko:
귀농한 부모님을 따라 시골 학교로 전학 온 지우. 상쾌한 공기, 여유로운 분위기.. 모두 마음에 들었다. 그러나 기분 좋게 새출발 할 수 있을 것 같았던 것도 잠시,
지우네가 정성껏 가꾼 꽃밭이 엉망이 된 걸 발견하는데..
누군가의 텃세일 거라 생각한 지우는 학교에서 자신에게 유독 까칠했던 동찬을 의심한다.
일단 저 앞머리! 무슨 생각 하는지 알 수 없게 하는 저 앞머리부터 까고 만다!!

altTitles.en: Honkai Impact 3rd - Escape From The Sky (Book 1001)
Honkai Impact 3rd - When Kiana Play Honkai Impact (Book 1011)

description.en:
The definitive source of lore, background, and epic saga of Honkai Impact 3rd, a 3D anime-style ARPG game developed and published by miHoYo.

*History:*
- 1952: 1st Honkai Eruption in Berlin
- 2000: 2nd Honkai Eruption in Siberia
- 2014: Honkai Outbreak in Nagazora

---

Honkai is a corrupting force that manifests itself as supernatural disasters, monstrous creatures, plagues, and Herrschers who can bend physical laws on a whim. Human civilization has been at war with the Honkai since the very beginning. The Valkyries are the mightiest warriors of humanity. They are our only hope.

---

+++ Extraneous information
**Contributor note:** There currently is an ongoing cleanup with the goal of moving each book to it's own title. Help would be appreciated [[Link](https://forums.mangadex.org/threads/honkai-impact-3rd-data-fixing-cleanup.1071951)]

0.2 | Done | 2000 CE. | Second Eruption. !!2000-FEB-01: The entire research staff of Schicksal Babylon Honkai research facility in Siberia disappeared in a single night. Overseer Otto Apocalypse dispatched his 2nd in command Theresa Apocalypse to investigate this mystery. Welt and Einstein of Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, prepare for the worst. They suspect the 2nd Eruption is about to happen.!!
0.21 | Done | 2012-2013 CE. | Gemini - Origin
0.3 | Done | 2012-2013 CE. | Azure Waters. !!2012: Bronya Zaychik, the Silver Wolf of the Urals, finds herself adopted by Cocolia in her orphanage. Bronya would later befriend Seele, unaware of the tragedy that lays in wait for them.!!
1 | Done | 2014 CE. | Escape from Nagazora
2 | Done | 2014 CE. | St. Freya High
3 | Done | 2014 CE. | Sakura Samsara. !!Theresa's innate eight-fold cherry blossom stigma malfunctioned and caused her to fall into a coma. To wake their principal, Mei entered the stigma data space to investigate the cause. Meanwhile, Theresa woke up in what appears to be medieval Japan and find herself embroiled in a never-ending Samsara.!!
4 | Done | 2014 CE. | Final Samsara. !!A vengeful entity dwells within Theresa's innate stigma, and she must do what she can to prevent Yae Sakura's will to become forever corrupted by this ancient terror. Can Theresa defeat this monster, or will she lose herself to the endless cycle?!!
5 | Done | 2014 CE. | AE Invasion. !!Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, made an attempt to kidnap the 3rd Herrscher - Mei Raiden. Will the Valkyries of St. Freya High defeat the invaders and save each other?!!

8 | Done | 2015 CE. | Second Key. !!Schicksal initiated tests on the Second Key they've acquired from the city of London. Durandal didn't expect to find him inside the key.!!
9 | Ongoing | 2005 / 2029 CE. | Alien Space. !!Young Himeko got into Caltech and met a surprisingly young substitute space engineering course lecturer who also happens to share her interest in space aliens.!!

title.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Detector
I Will Become a Poison Detector in the Dark World
I Will Become a Poison Detector of Darkness

altTitles.zh: 完蛋！成了反派的试毒小跟班

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la detectora de veneno del Villano

description.en:
I, an innocent office worker, possessed a character in the devastating novel *The Poisoned Apple*. On top of that, I'm Giselle Lloydsvin, a villainess who gets poisoned to death before being hanged! But the poison brought by the assassins doesn't work? It even tastes like fruit!

"You'll be okay since it's only a little bit, so hurry and drink it."

…Even though I possessed someone, it seems my destiny is to be tormented by a crazy assassin. 

However, "Leniel", who I thought was just a crazy assassin, turns out to be the frontman for the final villain, "Wayne Ayore"?!

In order to hold onto this lifeline, I clung to the villain in *The Poisoned Apple*. 

"I can distinguish the taste of poison."

“Poison?”

“Yes.”

“What use is that?”

“Your boss is going to be poisoned, so I can be his poison taster.”

And so, I thought I could survive well as a general store employee of the villain’s frontman(?)... 

“My boss is so strong to the point that there’s something suspicious about him!”

…Why does it feel like I’m doomed in this life too?

Left to himself at an early age in the slummiest parts of today’s Japan, Kiichi learns how to survive on his own. As a teenager, how can he adapt to a society whose rules he rejects? Unless he creates his own rules… Kiichi, a raw icon of strength and integrity, stands alone against the world’s injustice and becomes an unforgettable character.
description.pt-br: Deixado a si mesmo desde cedo nas partes mais pobres do Japão de hoje, Kiichi aprende como sobreviver por conta própria. Na adolescência, como ele pode se adaptar a uma sociedade cujas regras ele rejeita? A menos que ele crie suas próprias regras... Kiichi, um ícone bruto de força e integridade, se coloca sozinho contra a injustiça do mundo e se torna um personagem inesquecível.

altTitles.ja: クソザコボウコウ押井さん

title.en: Kuro Mahou Ryou no San Akunin

description.en:
By the Reiwa era, delinquents have been completely eliminated even from schools of magic...or so everyone thought. Even the "Black Magic Dormitory", formerly a wild and out of control place where the dark magic ne'er-do-wells gathered, is now on the verge of being demolished due to no new students having been placed into it for ages. The dorm's poor environment, residents receiving scorn and distain from teachers, and resulting low prospects of employment after graduation made the dorm's popularity sharply drop starting with Gen Z...until this year, when three female students are placed into it! So each of them makes an oath to themselves that they'll escape from the dorm, no matter what happens to the other two! 

However, those girls do not yet know the dreadful prophecy, which will affect the entire magical world, that is descending upon them.

(Source: Shogakukan)
description.ja:
ヤンキーは魔法学校でも絶滅寸前！

時は令和。かつてワルが集い荒れた【黒魔法寮】も、入寮者が途絶え廃寮寸前。だが今年の入寮生はなんと女子が3人！環境劣悪、先生に忌み嫌われ、卒業後の就職率も低い。黒魔法寮の現状を見た彼女達は、それぞれ胸に誓う。ここから脱出するのだ――他の2人はどうなってもいいから！

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

description.en: Eri Hourai, a second-year high school girl, takes over "Pandora" - a bakery specialising in wood fire cooked goods.
description.ja: 祖父のお店を引き継ぎ、黙々とパン職人をしている高校生・蓬莱絵里（ほうらいえり）。ある日、突然お店にやってきたはらぺこ少女・野々宮麦（ののみやむぎ）から「メロンパン20個ください！」と無茶振りをされる。麦との出会いによって、恵理は少しずつ心が開かれていって…？
description.zh: 追随前人，过往足迹，今日的少女，也在进行烘焙

description.en: 100 Short Manga about Types of and Behavior in Yuri Relationships
Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

title.en: Love in the Bottom of the 9th Inning

description.en:
As a manager, having a "favorite" is improper. And yet, Honda can't seem to shake off the feelings she has caught for Yazaki....?

*(Published in the Oct 2023 issue of LaLaDX)*

Kiana who was brought into the Saint Freya Academy by Wuliangta Himeko received training to become a Valkyrie at the request of the head of the school, Teresa. During the training process, Kiana accidentally met her ancestor Karen who died years ago, and "she" who has been entangled with Karen all her life, also appeared in front of Teresa... (MTL)

---

- 1952: 1st Honkai Eruption in Berlin
- 2000: 2nd Honkai Eruption in Siberia
- 2014: Honkai Outbreak in Nagazora

description.zh: 被无量塔姬子带入圣芙蕾雅学园的琪亚娜三人，在学园长德丽莎的要求下，接受成为女武神的培训，在训练过程中，琪亚娜却意外遇见了500年前死去的祖先卡莲，和卡莲纠缠一生的“她”，也出现在了德丽莎的面前...

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

description.en:
A series created for the Honkai Impact 3rd Anniversary Event, the Summer Memories Arc lets readers take a closer look into the daily lives of St Freya's Valkyries as they enjoy the sights and sounds of the coastal city of Soukai, bathed in brilliant sunlight as wispy clouds scuddle across the azure sky. No matter whether it's Kiana consulting the great Bishop for culinary advice, or Himeko visiting the Yae Hospital to look for a magical love potion, there's never a dull moment in sight when the girls are serious about having fun!  


---

description.zh: 在街头徘徊的琪亚娜正在为打工而苦恼，阴差阳错之下她来到了吼姆欢乐餐厅，还通过了面试，然而意想不到的事还是发生了，并由此拉开了这个夏天的序幕…

altTitles.en: Revenge of the Sword Clan's Hound
Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound
Return of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound
The Return of the Iron-Blood Sword Hound

altTitles.fr: La revanche du limier des Baskerville

altTitles.pt-br: O retorno do cão de caça dos Baskerville
A vingança do cão de caça de sangue de ferro Baskerville

altTitles.es: La venganza del sabueso de la espada sangrienta

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del sabueso de sangre de hierro

altTitles.th: การกลับมาของหมาล่าเนื้อตระกูลดาบเลือดเหล็ก

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.
description.pt-br:
Criados para matar como uma matilha de cães leais, as crianças Baskerville tiraram inúmeras vidas como um bando de assassinos temíveis.

Apesar de ser o filho ilegítimo rejeitado da ninhada, Vikir serviu sua família fielmente, apenas para encontrar sua morte prematura nas mãos de seu pai. Mas quando ele inexplicavelmente renasce com uma segunda chance na vida, Vikir, armado com as memórias e o conhecimento de seu passado, jura se elevar acima da matilha e se vingar.

Desta vez, ele está pronto para morder a mão que o alimenta.

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

altTitles.vi: Câu lạc bộ siêu cấp về nhà

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.tl: Inimbitahan si Shun sa Klab ng Uwian ni Naoki Satou, na kilala rin bilang "Chokki-chan". Kahit na tumanggi siya, napasama pa rin siya sa mga gawain ng klab sa medyo pilit na paraan! Isang romantikong komedya tungkol sa Klab ng Uwian na tampok ang isang hayskul na dalaga na mahilig maglibot at isang bagong estudyante sa hayskul na nawalan ng pangarap.
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
description.pt-br: Shun foi convidado para o Clube vá-para casa por Naoki Satou, também conhecido como "Chokki-chan". Apesar de recusar, ele acaba se envolvendo de alguma forma nas atividades do clube! Uma comédia romântica do Clube vá-para casa apresentando uma colegial amante de desvios e um novo aluno do ensino médio que perdeu seu sonho.

altTitles.fr: Tsugai : Daemons of the Shadow Realm

description.en:
The manga centers on Yuru, a boy who lives in a remote mountain village, spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day, Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village, her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/daemons-of-the-shadow-realm)
description.ja: 山奥の小さな村落に住む少年のユルは、野鳥を狩り、大自然の中で静かに暮らしていた。しかしユルの双子の妹のアサは、何故か村の奥にある牢の中で「おつとめ」を果たしているという。それはまるで幽閉されているかのように…。穏やかな村に浮かぶ不自然な謎、この村に隠された秘密とは一体…!?
description.ru: Сюжет расскажет о мальчике Юру из далекой горной деревни, который проводит свое время в единении с природой, охотясь за птицами. Но однажды его сестру-близнеца Асу призвали служить в тюрьме, находящейся в центре деревни. После этого Юру постепенно разгадывает тайну, скрытую в его тихой деревне...
description.pt-br: A trama acompanha Yuru, um jovem que vive em uma aldeia remota na montanha, onde vive da caça e se conecta com a natureza. Após Asa, sua irmã gêmea, ser chamada para servir na prisão da vila, Yuru começa a desvendar um mistério sobrenatural que envolve sua aldeia.

altTitles.en: A Love Letter and a 13-Year-Old Actress

altTitles.vi: Lá thư tình và nữ diễn viên 13 tuổi

description.en: Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day, he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him...? She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than most adults.
description.ja: 芸能事務所で経理として働く一色文は、ある日営業へと部署異動を言い渡される。担当するまだ13歳の子役の少女、羽賀文乃は、妙に文のことを気に入ったようで…？
description.vi:
Isshiki Fumi là nhân viên kế toán của một công ty giải trí. Một ngày nọ, anh được thuyên chuyển sang phòng kinh doanh - bộ phận quản lý các tài năng. Đối tượng quản lý của anh là một đứa trẻ 13 tuổi, Haga Ayano, một nữ diễn viên nhí…?

Một câu chuyện hồi hộp về một nữ diễn viên nhí chuyên nghiệp với cách hành xử trưởng thành hơn cả người lớn, và quản lý của cô bé.

description.en: Takasago Shin, a skilled high school kendo player, faces a turning point in his life. A chance encounter shakes his confidence and forces him to question his path. In the world of clashing swords and quiet rivalries, *Minasoko* explores the pursuit of strength, purpose, and self-discovery.

altTitles.vi: Thiên đường song song tại dị giới

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.ja: 異世界に迷い込んだ男子高生・太多陽太は、森の中で美少女騎士・ルーミと出会う。そこは少女だけが存在する世界。神の化身からルーミとの交尾を命じられる陽太。触れられただけで極限まで発情したルーミは‥‥!?
description.es-la: “Por favor, apareate conmigo”. En un mundo extraño, Youta Tada es atacado por una hermosa chica caballero en celo. Solamente monstruos temidos y chicas hermosas viven en este mundo.¡El único hombre es Youta Tada! ¿¡Es esto el cielo o el infierno para Youta!?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

altTitles.en: Scissor Seven: Black and White Twin Dragons

description.en: Mo Lang, a bad boy, and Bai Qi, his genius friend, lived a quiet life in a village in the distant country of Niuzhan. Until one day, a mysterious assassin from the country of Xuanwu appears, who completely subverts their lives, forcing the two youngsters to embark on an adventure that will change the world. The manhua is a prequel to the animated series Scissor Seven, chronicling events from before the original series.
